descriptions.alert: Displays a callout for user attention.
descriptions.alertDialog: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.
descriptions.avatar: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.
descriptions.badge: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.
descriptions.button: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.
descriptions.card: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.
descriptions.checkbox: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
descriptions.dataGrid: Powerful data grid component with sorting, filtering, and pagination.
descriptions.switch: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
descriptions.select: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from‚Äîtriggered by a button.
descriptions.textarea: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.
descriptions.dialog: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window, rendering the content underneath inert.
descriptions.dropdownMenu: Displays a menu to the user‚Äîsuch as a set of actions or functions‚Äîtriggered by a button.
descriptions.input: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.
descriptions.loading: Indicates that an action is being processed or data is being loaded.
descriptions.progress: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.
descriptions.tabs: Displays a set of sections of content‚Äîknown as tab panels‚Äîthat are displayed one at a time.
descriptions.slider: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.
descriptions.popover: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.
descriptions.tooltip: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it.
descriptions.scrollArea: Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling.
descriptions.richTextEditor: A rich text editor component for editing HTML content.
descriptions.monthYearPicker: A date picker for selecting a month and year.
descriptions.dateRangePicker: A date picker for selecting a range of dates.
descriptions.singleDatePicker: A date picker for selecting a single date.
descriptions.modernDrawer: A modern, accessible drawer component with multiple placement options.
descriptions.passwordInput: A password input component with a show/hide toggle.
descriptions.numberInput: A number input component with increment/decrement controls.
descriptions.calendar: A calendar component for displaying dates.
descriptions.collapsible: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.
descriptions.formError: Displays an error message for a form field.
descriptions.stepper: Displays progress through a sequence of steps.
descriptions.dynamicBreadcrumb: Displays the path to the current resource.
descriptions.enhancedDataTable: An enhanced data table with sorting and filtering.
descriptions.enhancedPagination: A pagination component for navigating pages.
descriptions.enhancedSearchFilters: A component for advanced search filtering.
descriptions.enterpriseErrorBoundary: A boundary for catching and displaying errors.
descriptions.labelAdvanced: An advanced label component with required indicator support.
descriptions.commandMenu: A command menu for quick navigation and actions.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These terms of service set out the rules and conditions you must follow when using our website and services. By using our service, you agree to these terms.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: The platform provides a digital workspace environment where users can manage projects, organize tasks, and enable team collaboration.
serviceDescription.note: Our service is continuously being developed, and new features may be added or existing features may be modified.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: When using our service, you undertake the following responsibilities:
userResponsibilities.item2: Protecting your account security and keeping your passwords confidential
userResponsibilities.item3: Using our service only for legal purposes
userResponsibilities.item4: Respecting the rights of other users

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.intro: The following activities are strictly prohibited:

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, designs, logos and other materials on the platform are protected by copyright. You may not copy, modify or distribute these materials without permission.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: While we strive to provide our service in the best possible way, our liability for any interruptions, data loss or service quality issues is limited. You accept the service as is.

serviceModifications.title: Service Modifications
serviceModifications.content: We reserve the right to make changes to our service, add or remove features at any time. We try to inform our users in advance of significant changes.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate your account without warning if you violate these terms. You may also terminate your account yourself at any time.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Turkey. Turkish courts have jurisdiction in case of any disputes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms of service, you can contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data. Your privacy is important to us and we manage your data responsibly.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information to better serve you:

informationUse.title: How We Use Information
informationUse.intro: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
informationUse.item1: To provide and improve our services
informationUse.item5: To inform you about important updates

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We are very careful about sharing your personal information with third parties.
informationSharing.commitment: We do not sell, rent or share your data with unauthorized third parties.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take industry-standard security measures to protect your data:

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary. When you delete your account, your data is securely removed from the system.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
userRights.right1: Access to your data and obtaining a copy

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies on our website to improve your experience. These cookies are used to analyze site performance and remember your preferences.
cookies.note: You can disable cookies from your browser settings, but some features may not work in this case.

policyChanges.title: Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through the site.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about our privacy policy or data processing practices, you can contact us:

homepage.title: Next.js Enterprise Boilerplate
homepage.description: A comprehensive starter template with authentication, UI components, and everything you need to build modern web applications.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: Complete auth system with JWT tokens, protected routes, and user management.

components.title: Components
components.description: 50+ pre-built components with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS styling.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Admin dashboard with user management, analytics, and settings.

getStarted.title: Get Started

footer.description: Enterprise-ready Next.js boilerplate for modern web applications.
Enterprise-ready Next.js boilerplate for modern web applications.

hero.description: The most comprehensive Next.js boilerplate with authentication, beautiful UI components, and everything you need to launch your SaaS product in days, not months.

features.sectionDescription: Pre-built components, authentication, database integration, and deployment ready configuration.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Optimized for performance with Next.js 15, React 18, and modern build tools.

secure.title: Secure by Default
secure.description: Built-in security best practices, JWT authentication, and data validation.

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.description: Radix UI components with Tailwind CSS and dark mode support.

developer.title: Developer Experience
developer.description: TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier, and hot reload for smooth development.

production.title: Production Ready
production.description: Deployment-ready configuration for Vercel, Netlify, and Docker.

team.title: Team Collaboration
team.description: User management, role-based access, and team workspace features.

pricing.sectionDescription: Choose the plan that's right for your project

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for personal projects and learning

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Everything you need for professional projects

testimonials.sectionDescription: Join thousands of developers who trust Starkon for their projects

testimonial1.content: This template saved us months of development time. Authentication system and components are production ready.
testimonial1.author: Sarah Chen

testimonial2.content: Great developer experience. TypeScript setup and component library speeds up feature development incredibly.
testimonial2.author: Michael Rodriguez

testimonial3.content: The best Next.js starter I've used. Clean code, excellent documentation, everything just works!
testimonial3.author: Emily Johnson

faq.sectionDescription: Everything you need to know about Starkon
faq.answer1: Authentication system, 50+ UI components, dashboard templates, database integration, and deployment configuration.
faq.question2: Can I use this for commercial projects?
faq.answer2: Yes! All paid plans include commercial licenses. The free version is for personal and open-source projects.
faq.answer3: Pro and Enterprise plans include email support. Enterprise customers get priority support and custom development assistance.
faq.question4: How often do you update the boilerplate?
faq.answer4: We release updates monthly with new components, bug fixes, and latest Next.js features.

cta.title: Ready to Build Something Amazing?
cta.description: Join thousands of developers who have already shipped products with Starkon. Start building your next project today.
